text: [Music]
your Fleet of iot devices has diverse
capabilities is long lived and is
geographically distributed these
characteristics coupled with the growing
number of connected devices raise
questions about how to address security
risks to further amplify security risks
many devices have limited compute
ability memory and storage capabilities
which restricts opportunities for
security despite existing protections
like device identity management and
encryption breaches using iot devices
still happen such as distributed denial
of service attacks this can lead to loss
of reputation and even unauthorized
releases of
information AWS iot device Defender a
fully managed service that helps you
secure your entire fleet of iot devices
keeping them running securely AWS iot
device Defender audits iot resources as
associated with your devices such as
x509 certificates and iot policies to
make sure they aren't deviating from
best practices and sends alerts if there
are any gaps that might indicate a
security risk these alerts provide
contextual information and
recommendations to investigate and
mitigate the issue AWS iot device
Defender also continuously monitors
security metrics from the cloud as well
as device side against userdefined rules
to identify unexpected device behavior
that may be indicative of a compromised
device it sends you an alert if
something doesn't look right with AWS
iot device Defender you can maintain
secure Cloud iot configuration monitor
your device behavior and get better
insight into sources of threats learn
more at aws.amazon.com
slot dvice dender
